@anatine/zod-openapi: Extends all Zod types with z.openapi(metadata) method
@emotion/react: Used by Material-UI for styling React components
@emotion/styled: Used by Material-UI for styling React components
@mui/icons-material: Provides Material Design icons for use
@mui/lab: Provides additional components and utilities from Material-UI
@mui/material: The core Material-UI library for building web UI
@mui/styles: Used by Material-UI for styling React components
@mui/x-tree-view: Provides a TreeView component from Material-UI for displaying hierarchical data
@org/shared: Contains shared code, models, and types used other packages
@preact/signals-react: Provides a way to use Preact signals in React components for the frontend
@tanstack/react-query: Used for data fetching and caching
@ts-rest/core: Core library for building the TypeScript REST API
@ts-rest/open-api: Generates OpenAPI documentation from the @ts-rest/core API
@ts-rest/react-query: Integrates @tanstack/react-query with the @ts-rest/core API for the frontend
bcrypt: Used for hashing and verifying user passwords
body-parser: Parses incoming request bodies in the Express.js middleware
bottlejs: Inversion of Control (IoC) container for dependency injection
compression: Compresses responses to reduce data transfer
cookie-parser: Parses cookie headers in incoming requests
cors: Provides a middleware for enabling CORS in the Express.js app
cross-dirname: Utility for getting the directory path of a file
express: The web framework used for building the backend API
helmet: Collection of security middleware for Express.js
hpp: Protects against HTTP Parameter Pollution attacks
http-status: Utility for working with HTTP status codes
i18next-browser-languagedetector: Detects the user's language in the browser for i18n
i18next-http-backend: Loads translation files from the server for i18n
jsonwebtoken: Used for generating and verifying JSON Web Tokens (JWT)
material-ui-popup-state: Provides a state management solution for popups and menus in the Material-UI frontend UI
mongodb: The official MongoDB driver for Node.js used
morgan: HTTP request logger middleware for Express.js
react: The core React library used for building web UI
react-i18next: Integrates i18next with React for internationalization
react-router-dom: Provides routing functionality for the React frontend application
swagger-jsdoc: Generates OpenAPI documentation from JSDoc comments
swagger-ui-express: Renders the Swagger UI for the OpenAPI documentation
winston: Logging library used for application logging
winston-daily-rotate-file: Winston transport for logging to a rotating file
zod: TypeScript-first schema validation library used throughout the project
